projects.title: Luxury Estate Deep Clean
projects.description: Complete deep cleaning of a 6,500 sq ft luxury estate. Tackled years of buildup, transforming every room from dusty to dazzling.

projects.title: Move-Out Transformation
projects.description: Complete move-out cleaning for a luxury rental. Restored to better-than-new condition for the homeowner.

projects.title: Airbnb Quick Turnover
projects.description: Same-day turnover for a busy Airbnb property. Guest checkout at 11am, new guests at 3pm. Complete clean done with time to spare.

projects.title: Post-Renovation Cleanup
projects.description: Kitchen and bathroom renovation left construction dust everywhere. Our team made it sparkle.

projects.title: Weekly Home Maintenance
projects.description: Ongoing weekly cleaning for a busy family of five. Consistent quality every visit.

projects.title: Medical Office Deep Clean
projects.description: Medical-grade deep cleaning for a healthcare office. Sanitization protocols and attention to every surface.
